duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate and manage all global project activities for the Global MIS team, ensuring successful project delivery.
Create and maintain a unified project plan, establish baselines, and report status to stakeholders and IT PMO.
Facilitate detailed requirements gathering and workshop sessions with business leads to gather project requirements.
Work closely with the IS team on design, development, and alignment of agile demos for business workstream leads.
Manage interface files and SuccessFactors Talent Modules such as Goal Management, Performance Appraisals, Employee Profiles, Succession Planning, Calibration, and Comp Module.
Implement role-based security approaches and communication strategies across diverse teams in multiple countries.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Project Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
